Pathfinder:
We're trackers sent from the Ivory Tower to resist the nightmare invasion. We are waiting for a traveler like you to challenge darkness in the outskirts of Kamaloka.
The surroundings of Kamaloka are the invasion of darkness through dreams. If we do not stop him, then people will die in their sleep.
We have developed a countermeasure. If you are brave enough, challenge the Outskirts of Kamaloka!
